name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan has the highest life expectancy in the world, with an average life expectancy of 84 years.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world, stretching over 202,080 km.

name: India
interesting_fact: India is the largest democracy in the world with over 900 million eligible voters.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is the only country that is also a continent.

name: Germany
interesting_fact: Germany is home to the world's oldest brewery, Weihenstephan, which was founded in 1040.

name: Russia
interesting_fact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area, covering over 17 million square kilometers.

name: Egypt
interesting_fact: The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World still in existence.

name: Mexico
interesting_fact: Mexico introduced chocolate, chillies, and corn to the world.

name: Argentina
interesting_fact: Argentina is the birthplace of the tango, one of the most famous dances in the world.

name: Saudi Arabia
interesting_fact: Saudi Arabia is home to the largest sand desert in the world, the Rub' al Khali, or 'Empty Quarter'.

name: New Zealand
interesting_fact: New Zealand was the first country to grant women the right to vote in 1893.
